attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore an OBE
attributes.additional_details: He has shown true British Mettle and is a fine role Model by raising > £16 Million through sheer grit and determination To be honoured with an OBE.
attributes.background: I want the government to honour Captain Tom Moore a 99 year old veteran

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
